name: Fallen Down the Edge
description:
By Edwin

How to Play: Movement: 
  • WASD or Arrow keys to move.
  • Move the mouse to look.
  • Left click or Space to interact when a prompt appears.
Quit Game: 
  • Escape key twice in succession.
Hints:
  • The element is the key.
  • Mushrooms are tasty.
  • Take the leap.
Changes:
  • Version 1.0
    •  Initial release.
